text:
@BetteMidler 👇👇👇👇👇Bette,
Humpty Trumpty pissed himself Friday after finding out he was exposed to coronavirus 🦠. Serves him right. @realDonaldTrump has a personal responsibility to visit & embrace all people in the US who contract coronavirus. Fair is fair. https://t.co/ypidapfSwK
